description: Jackson Lawrence had always been the heartthrob of the town when he was growing up. There was a distinct sadness and disappointment in the female population when he announced he was joining the Marines and being sent overseas. He was gone for four long years before his parents spread the word that Jackson was coming home. By then most of the girls that had swooned over him in high school had either moved out of Elderberry ville or married and begun their families. "Did you hear Jackson Lawrence is coming home?" Janessa asked looking at me with excitement lacing her voice. "Who?" Savannah sipped her cider and relished the cinnamon apple flavor that made her want to purr. She blew on it to cool it and looked over the rim at her friend, her only friend since taking over the small restaurant in town, and waited for her to explain why she should care about this guy Jackson.
title: A Marine for Dinner
